title: Find the Blood of Lathander
content:
athanderian statues and a secret passageway opened - we should see what lies within.

We found an oddly shaped crest that belonged to a high priestess of Lathander. Perhaps it can help us find the Blood of Lathander?

Very elaborate traps block our path down this passageway - whatever sits at the end must be worth protecting.

We bested the Secret Chamber's traps - we should see what they were guarding.

Find the Blood of Lathander Walkthrough
